name: 2DShooter (Rcade218)
description:
This is Project 2 making a 2D Shooter. Currently this is under development and is only a tutorial submission. Unfortunately the WebGL is not working correctly at the moment but will be on final submission next week.  My proposed ideas for the game are the following:

1) 3 completely different levels with their own unique way of winning the game

2) Custom music for the game made by an online app 

3) Reskin the players and enemies to a different color

Created by Ronit Kiri
